name: The life in house
description:
Live the days of Y. 

Find out about his life by pressing enter on everything even in the following days.

You have to do some quests. and live life at home. What can ever go wrong? What happen?

You can go straight to the point of the quest or ignore the quest and first explore to find secrets, events.

You can find the game in the original language, Italian, in my profile.
